data.message: Hi , any chance of me getting a video too ??? I am only been giving 6 pics , thanks in advance and heres hoping

replies.message: Hi Eithne. Depending on how much content you've shared and how long you've been on Facebook, you will see a personalized movie, a collection of photos or a simple thank you card. -Ryan
thanks, Im member since 2009 or earlier and share loads of stuff and have 100's of photos , ah well maybe my memories are too precious to share ,thanks for the reply

This is PURE B.S. !!!!! I'm on here many times a day and have been since I joined with ALOT of content ....IF you couldn't do it for EVERYONE ...NOBODY shouldve got 1 ....WHAT ARE YOU THINKIN ????????
me too :'(
Then what else do you do?    I have only received about 6 pictures that I didn't really want on the opening, and this came with a thank you note.   That's it!!
yo quiero mi video por favor
Facebook, I had a video, but when I tried to show someone else, the video disappeared. I only have 6 pictures. How do I get the video back?

WE SHOULD  be able to put together our own video of what we feel is important - I had one and thought if I delete it maybe it would grab other photo's... but no it disappeared all together and all I get are 6 pictures... seems very strange the way it picked up what we shared over the time we have been on - and I have been on for a long time too -- although I do delete stuff when I am done - but I will tell you I have tons of pictures on here.... tsk tsk ...
Solo foto e niente video
I HAD my video but now all im getting is a thank you and 6 pictures.. how can I get it back???
mee to
vERY UPSET THAT MY VIDEO WONT LOAD, BEEN A MEMEBER SINCE 2010 AND AM ON HERE ALL THE TIME.
Andrea what did you fine out ???? That is all I am getting to .....
me to as well, HAD my video now only get a thank you and 6 pics.  how do you get it back??
Me too.
Facebook mine doesn't show as a video and no share button help please
same with me, I had the video and it went away now I just have pictures
I am having the same problem. Six photos nothing else, no share button or anything. Maybe they are being made in intervals?
I only get 6 photos... No video, no share button nothing. Just thanks Tina and 6 photos.
me too :(
I had a video yesterday but no sharing button. Today is the video gone. Only photos. Why? :-(
Facebook, you need to do something about this issue.
very disappointed i got a thank u card
How can I get my video back it was accidently deleted and I would really appreciate getting it back as it was a lovely reminder... Hope you can give it back to me thanks
disappointed I have been on since 2009 and on everyday and I get just a thank you card
